function NPC_110035:Idle( ThisNPC, Enemy) local Mother = ThisNPC:GetTarget() if Mother == nil or Mother:IsNull() then return end
local Distance = Mother:DistanceTo( ThisNPC )
if Distance > 600 then ThisNPC:SetAlwaysRun( true ) ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Mother, -1 ) elseif Distance > 100 then ThisNPC:SetAlwaysRun( false ) ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Mother, -1 ) end
end
function NPC_110035:OnAggro( Target ) local Mother = this:GetTarget() if Mother == nil or Mother:IsNull() then return end
AsNPC(Mother):Assist( this ) end
function NPC_110035:OnVictory( ) --GLog( "OnVictory \n") local Mother = this:GetTarget() if Mother == nil or Mother:IsNull() or Mother:IsDead() then this:Despawn(false) end
--GLog( "Mother:" .. Mother:GetName() .. "\n" ) end
